subject: Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bjorgen, the six-time Olympic champion, won her fourth straight stage in the Tour de Ski in Dobbiaco, Italy, extending her overall lead to more than a minute and a half.
snippet: Bjorgen, the six-time Olympic champion, won her fourth straight stage in the Tour de Ski in Dobbiaco, Italy, extending her overall lead to more than a minute and a half.
